value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Here we are! We're just in time for
the harvest festival!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|What a lively village. It makes me
think about that spring festival we
went to...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Funny you should mention that! To
celebrate the harvest, they're holding
a competition here, too!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|I should have seen this coming. Me,
I just see festivals as a way to make
some money. I'd set up a stall...$k$pYou really enjoy them, though, don't
you?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|This should make both of us happy!
The competition's victor gets a
scrumptious prize...pumpkins!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Pumpkins?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|A year's supply!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|But... We've been eating carrots
every day... Take a look at this! My
hair is turning orange!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|I'm sure you're imagining it. Both
carrots and pumpkins are very
healthy foods.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Well... More free vegetables into the
larder means less money spent on
provisioning the army, I suppose...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロヘンリー,ch04_09_Henri_M_halloween17,Face|Trick or treat! Nya ha ha!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Agh! What are you supposed to be?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Dressing up as a monster is a
traditional part of the harvest festival!
It's also a lot of fun.$k$p$WmMPID_ハロヘンリー,ch04_09_Henri_M_halloween17,Face|You look like you want to enter the
competition. Beware! It's not going to
be easy to reap this harvest...$k$pBut...if you do manage to kill me,
don't worry! I won't mind at all!
Nya ha!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ハロヘンリー,ch04_09_Henri_M_halloween17,Face|Nya ha ha! You sure showed us! I'm
warning you, though—you can't get
rid of us so easily!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロジョーカー,ch05_14_Joker_M_halloween17,Face|Tch... I must persevere, for the sake
of my liege...$k$p$Sbs150|
